"BILIBILIAS has had back-end support since the beginning of its operation. We currently use student computers, but even so, there will be a monthly fee.
Therefore, we hope that users of BILIBILIAS can support some expenses, such as breakfast, milk tea and lunch, which can meet most of the expenses of BILIBILIAS.
Finally, I would like to thank all users who have donated and supported AS for BILIBILIAS.
You can donate anonymously and anonymously. It is recommended not to donate anonymously.
Bring contact information such as AS and QQ number. "

In order to save the download and content, BILIBILIAS needs to apply for storage permission. You can be assured of authorization. If your device brand is Xiaomi, you may see the description of access to other files such as photo albums. Don\'t worry. This software is released open source and only uses permissions to store files. Unless you change the download path to the album, you will not read the contents of the album.
To use BILIBILIAS, you need to agree to this permission, because you need to apply for storage permission from the system for downloading video.
